vc.prottype: FWLIBAPI short WINAPI cnc_wrpitchr(unsigned short FlibHndl, short length, IODBPI *pitch);

cmn.p: Writes the pitch error compensation data specified by "datano_s", "datano_e". The data must be stored in "data" array of "IODBPI" with signed binary format.

is.p: Writes the pitch error compensation data specified by "datano_s", "datano_e". The data must be stored in "data" array of "IODBPI" with signed binary format.

content.p: Specify the library handle. See "Library handle" for details.
Specify the data block length (size of IODBPI structure).
N : Number of pitch error compensation data
Pointer to the IODBPI structure including the pitch error compensation data. The IODBPI structure is as follows.

dl.dd: Specify the start number of the pitch error compensation data.
Specify the end number of the pitch error compensation data.

item.name: EW_LENGTH
item.content:
Data block length error

item.name: EW_NUMBER
item.content:
Data number error
Pitch error compensation data number(datano_s, datano_e) is wrong.

item.name: EW_DATA
item.content:
Data error
Pitch error compensation data(data) is out of range.

item.name: EW_NOOPT
item.content:
No option
This function needs the pitch error compensation option.

item.name: EW_PROT
item.content:
